#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int i, T, N, Q;
    long long K;
    vector<long long> moves;
    scanf("%d",&T);
    while(T--)
    {
    	moves.clear();
        scanf("%d",&N);
        for(i=0; i<N; i++) { scanf("%lld",&K); moves.push_back(K); }
        sort(moves.begin(), moves.end());
        for(i=1; i<N; i++) moves[i]+=moves[i-1];
        scanf("%d",&Q);
        while(Q--)
        {
            scanf("%lld",&K);
            printf("%d",lower_bound(moves.begin(), moves.end(), K) - moves.begin());
            if(Q) putchar(' ');
        }
        putchar('\n');
    }
    return 0;
}
